description: Gregorian Easter dates, starting after 2000-04-23, a(2000) = 54.
comments: Formulas may differ legitimately for years before 1583 (e.g., 1497).
links: H. Lichtenberg, Zur Interpretation der Gauss-schen Osterformel und ihrer Ausnahmeregeln, Historia Mathematica 24 (1997), pp. 441-444.
Index entries for sequences related to calendars
author: _Frank Ellermann_, May 10 2001
